item.title: 2-hour Outer Banks Wild Horse Tour by 4WD Truck
item.description: See the wild horses of Corolla on a 2-hour tour on the Outer Banks in North Carolina. Travel by open-air 4-wheel drive vehicle along the sand dunes and ocean to view the wild horses. Along the way, you'll also hear about the history and ecology of the island, stop for photo ops of the horses and other points of interests, and gain private access to the Wild Horse Conservation Area. Choose from several departure times during the day on a tour that includes 4WD tour and guide.

image.alt: 2-hour Outer Banks Wild Horse Tour by 4WD Truck

item.title: Manteo Historic Walking Tour
item.description: Go beyond the beaches and see how Manteo is one of the country’s most historic—and mysterious—places. Following your local guide, you’ll hear all about the “Lost Colony” of Roanoke, how pirates (like Blackbeard) lived and pillaged right here, the Underground Railroad, and more. In just one short excursion, you’ll traverse 400+ years of history at its wildest.

item.title: OBX Ghost Tours
item.description: Uncover the spooky history of the Outer Banks as you embark on a walking tour around downtown Manteo. Listen to tales about the Lost Colony and Blackbeard as you walk around stopping at landmarks including the Pioneer Theatre and Roanoke Lighthouse. Your guide also uses an EMF detector to search for spirits just like they do on paranormal TV shows.

item.title: Beginner Hang Gliding Lesson
item.description: With this beginner hang gliding lesson, take flight just a few miles from where the Wright Brothers flew their first aircraft. Start with a 30-minute “Ground School” introduction, take a short break, and then begin the flight portion of your lesson. Don your helmet and harness, and head out to the dunes near Jockey’s Ridge—from there, take five training flights over a few hours.

item.title: Self-Guided Audio Driving Tour in Outer Banks
item.description:
Download the GuideAlong self-guided audio tour and you'll discover more on your Outer Banks road trip. Hear fascinating behind-the-scenes stories, local tips and directions play automatically, all based on your location.
You'll be guided to all of the area's famous highlights as well as lessor known gems including three historic lighthouses that you can climb, look for wild horses in the dunes, wander the famous piers, and learn about the Wright Brothers' aviation history at a national memorial.
Enjoy the freedom to explore offline at your own pace, spending more time at places that interest you, and bypass any that don’t.
✅ Stories, tips and directions play automatically based on your location ✅ Travel at your own pace ✅ Tour offline using GPS, no cell service or WiFi needed ✅ Suggested itineraries for half, full or multi day use ✅ No time limits or expiry, free updates ✅ Like having a tour guide along for the drive
Purchase one tour per vehicle.

image.alt: Self-Guided Audio Driving Tour in Outer Banks

item.title: Outer Banks Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour
item.description:
Explore North Carolina's Outer Banks on this self-guided car tour. First, see the majestic Bodie Island Lighthouse and the peaceful Coquina Beach, where nature and history merge. Continue to Chicamacomico Life-Saving Station Historic Site, a maritime hero attraction. Next, see the Currituck Beach Lighthouse, a coastal landmark. Last stop: the Wright Brothers National Memorial, where flight dreams were realized. Explore maritime history and pioneering spirit in stunning coastal scenery.
After booking, check your email to download the separate Audio Tour Guide App by Action, enter your unique password, and access your tour. These steps require good internet/Wi-Fi access. From there, follow the audio instructions and the route.
New, extra validity — now yours for an entire year! Use multiple times over multiple trips!
This isn't an entrance ticket. Check opening hours before your visit.

image.alt: Outer Banks Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour

item.title: Jumpmasters OBX Fun Park
item.description: Obstacle courses, climbing walls, foam pits, trampolines, American Ninja Warrior course—Jumpmasters OBX Fun Park gets you soaring, flipping, diving, climbing, and, yes, jumping to new heights. Everything’s padded to ensure your safety, opening up the fun for all ages and fitness levels. And to keep your feet on solid ground, there’s axe-throwing, too.

item.title: Kayak Rental on the Outer Banks
item.description: The OBX is some 100+ miles long, but this kayak rental gets you right next to the Kitty Hawk Woods Coastal Preserve, one of the best family-friendly eco-tour locations in the Outer Banks. You and your crew will paddle along a glassy creek and through a maritime forest habitat—one of the state’s largest. Perfect for most ages and skill levels, it’s an only-in-OBX adventure.

image.alt: Kayak Rental on the Outer Banks

item.title: Gnarly Nags Head Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures are equal parts tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover in an alternate reality our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues - for points! They get to enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard, no matter what their score. They get to essentially race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors who have signed up in their city that day. Get ready to discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own!

item.title: Stand Up Paddleboard Adventure on the Outer Banks
item.description: Explore the waterways of Kitty Hawk on a stand up paddleboard (SUP) during this fun adventure. Join a small group and paddle through the gentle waters of the North Carolina Coastal Reserve for a look at the landscapes and to observe local wildlife. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced SUP’er this excursion is a great way to explore the area.

image.alt: Stand Up Paddleboard Adventure on the Outer Banks

item.title: Cape Hatteras National Seashore Self-Guided Audio Driving Tour
item.description:
Embark on a captivating drive along the Cape Hatteras National Seashore with this self-guided tour of North Carolina's Outer Banks. Dive into a rich tapestry of history, from tales of the Lost Colony to the legendary pirate Blackbeard as you marvel at stunning oceanside scenery. Visit the majestic Cape Hatteras Lighthouse, encounter the unique marine wonders of the Pamlico Sound, and so much more. This tour ends at the Hatteras Ferry in case you want to keep the adventure going on the remote island of Ocracoke. The barrier islands await!
After booking, check your email to download the separate Audio Tour Guide App by Action, enter your unique password, and access your tour. These steps require good internet/Wi-Fi access. From there, follow the audio instructions and the route.
New, extra validity — now yours for an entire year! Use multiple times over multiple trips!
This isn't an entrance ticket. Check opening hours before your visit.

image.alt: Cape Hatteras National Seashore Self-Guided Audio Driving Tour

item.title: Wright Brothers Carolina Dunes Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour
item.description:
Let the story of the Wright Brothers uplift you on this self-guided driving tour of the Carolina Dunes, where they made their first flight. Find out how these two young men went from repairing bicycles to building the first airplanes (and why those who came before failed) as you explore the majestic North Carolina seashore where the brothers made history. Visit the Wright Brothers National Memorial, stop by the garage site where they built their prototype, and then continue to take in some stunning views at the Currituck Beach Lighthouse and Corolla Beach.
After booking, check your email to download the separate Audio Tour Guide App by Action, enter your unique password, and access your tour. These steps require good internet/Wi-Fi access. From there, follow the audio instructions and the route.
New, extra validity — now yours for an entire year! Use multiple times over multiple trips!
This isn't an entrance ticket. Check opening hours before your visit.

image.alt: Wright Brothers Carolina Dunes Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour

item.title: Hourly Kayak Rental in Whalebone
item.description: This location is the ideal location for a first time paddler to try kayaking. The water is very shallow (less than waist deep) and we have an easy access point to the water. You can also have an opportunity to check out local wildlife as the access point is very near the Bodie Island Wildlife Refuge!

item.title: East Coast USA: Self-Guided Driving & Walking Tour Bundle
item.description: Explore some of the best spots for fall foliage on the East Coast, including Acadia, Shenandoah, and Great Smoky Mountains national parks, Kancamagus Highway, Blue Ridge Parkway, Bar Harbor, Newport, Salem, and the Freedom Trail, with this self-guided driving tour. Enjoy the flexibility to travel at your own pace, with hands-free functionality, turn-by-turn directions, and offline access. Includes full itineraries, travel tips, audio guide, and text.

image.alt: East Coast USA: Self-Guided Driving & Walking Tour Bundle

item.title: Private Professional Photoshoot in Outer Banks OBX
item.description:
Get ready for a remarkable journey through the colorful and vibrant landscapes of the Outer Banks! We're thrilled to guide you on a leisurely exploration of this iconic American destination, showcasing the most scenic landmarks the Outer Banks has to offer, along with hidden treasures that many have yet to discover.
Beyond capturing your moments with our professional photography, we're excited to share exclusive insights and tips to enhance your visit. Dive into the Outer Banks' best-kept secrets with us, making every snapshot of your trip unforgettable. We look forward to meeting you and starting this extraordinary adventure together!

image.alt: Private Professional Photoshoot in Outer Banks OBX
